content-plugin.name: YumContentSourcePlugin
content-plugin.description: Provides the ability to obtain content from a Yum repository
content-plugin.serverplugin:help: Provides a content source that retrieves content from a local or remote Yum repository.

contentSourceType.name: YumSource
contentSourceType.description: This content source retrieves packages from a local or remote Yum repository.

c:simple-property.name: location
c:simple-property.description: The URL or path to the Yum repository

c:simple-property.name: username
c:simple-property.description: The optional user name to authenticate with

c:simple-property.name: password
c:simple-property.description: The optional password to authenticate with
